Package org.vsplf.i18n

Dynamic-I18N framework from VSPLF Software Foundation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ILocaleAware The LocaleAware interface.
ITranslatorFactory The TranslatorFactory interface to gets implementation instances.
Translator The Translator APIs to translate any message.
TranslatorBuilder The TranslatorBuilder for easier usage of Translator.
 

Class Summary
TranslatorFactory The Translator factory class is the main entry point for client's code.
